Title: Requires signage for limousines reminding passengers to wear a seatbelt
Summary: Provides that every limousine sold, registered and operated in this state shall have a sign posted in plain sight reminding passengers to wear a seatbelt while inside the limousine.
LawCode: Add ยง384, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring signage for limousines reminding passengers to wear a seatbelt
